document_data.name: House of Crystal
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Crystal''' was the guildhall of a [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Guild of Glassblowers, Glaziers, and Spectacle-makers]].
document_data.Location: This guildhall was located along the western side of [[Copper Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Services: One could purchase a variety of glass goods from this building, including [[crystal ball]]s and mirrors. Prices for glass goods ranged from 1 [[silver piece]] to up to 600 [[gold piece]]s.
document_data.Reputation: The House of the Crystal was among some of the more notable and recognizable guildhalls in the North Ward.
